entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as expressing her opinion on the justice system. She says 'regurgitating toilets!' and raises her eyebrows.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as speaking softly to Professor Umbridge. He also wears half-moon spectacles perched halfway down his crooked nose.

entities.name: fortescue
entities.description: Fortescue is a portrait of a corpulent, red-nosed wizard on the wall behind Dumbledore's desk. He roars 'Blatant corruption!'

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as continuing to explain the purpose of Potter's meeting with students.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as being persuaded by Dumbledore to join an illegal society.

entities.name: willy widdershins
entities.description: Willy Widdershins is a student who allegedly heard something that made him think the Ministry was corrupt.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Umbridge disagree on the purpose of Potter's meeting with students. Dumbledore says 'I think you'll find you're wrong there, Dolores'.
Fortescue and Dumbledore disagree on the Ministry's corruption. Fortescue says 'Blatant corruption!' while Dumbledore is silent.
